level.text: Any information obtained from a property owner pursuant to §§ 330 – 339 concerning any income derived from investment or income-producing real property shall be accorded the same confidentiality as that applied to District income tax returns under § 4(a) of Title 5 of the District of Columbia Franchise Tax Act of 1947 (61 Stat. 342; D.C. Code § 47-1805.4) (1981 Ed.).

Any violation of the provisions of this section shall be a misdemeanor and shall be punishable by a fine not exceeding one thousand dollars ($ 1,000) or imprisonment for six (6) months, or both, in the discretion of the D.C. Superior Court.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 25 DCR 10919, 10924 (June 22, 1979), 16 DCRR § 105.
